text:
How I escaped the war in Ukraine. 
Vukile Dlamini @vukiledlamini19 a Medical Student in Vinnytsia Ukraine shares her horror story. #africansinukraine #nigeriansinukraine #africanstudentsinukraine #sumy #kherson #khersoncity full video on IG/Africans in Diaspora. Link in Bio https://t.co/249pn68J54
